comment._content: it is truly sad when a 15 year old girl has to go to prison for stealing a coat.

comment._content: poor little one just trying to keep warm thats all

comment.author: 56480007@N03
comment._content:
Poor wee thing!

 Is this what we are heading back to with the erosion of social security!
 Wonder how many girls of her age were also driven into prostitution just to get food and clothes...

comment.author: 48207431@N00
comment._content:
I wondered just what constituted "hard labour" for a woman prisoner?
Good to read the empathic comments associated with this child prisoner who seems not to have even a shawl to warm her.
